snippet: London has been preparing seven years, ever since it defeated Paris in the final round of the International Olympic Committee vote in 2005.
lead_paragraph: London has been preparing seven years, ever since it defeated Paris in the final round of the International Olympic Committee vote in 2005.

headline.main: For London, the Payoff for Seven Years of Preparation Is About to Arrive
headline.print_headline: For London, the Payoff for Seven Years of Preparation Is About to Arrive
